Posts.Content: Dec 22, 2011 09:15AM smatherlee wrote: Mom2JJ, I feel your pain.  The lidocaine didn't work for me during one of my core biopsies.  The worst thing I've ever experienced!  But I've had several more since then where the lidocaine did work.  I'm going Jan 6 for my BMX and DIEP reconstruction.
Posts.Title: Mastectomy Dec 2011 hawaiik Blessings2011
